column4: Very Nice cuban guy, Jamil, very fun and the food was soooo good !! The ambiance was amazing too I really enjoyed !!
Had an amazing experience, our first stop for food/drinks as we arrived. El Cubano served us and was attentive and polite! Will recommend
Nice location in the Plaza Mayor square. Sangria was good and the menu had a variety of options. â€œEl cubanoâ€ did a good job as our server.
Great service from the cuban waitor, good prices for the location and the sangria and tinto de verano was very good.
Great service, cheap for being in Plaza Mayor. Cuban waiter was very friendly. I would definitely recommend to anyone visiting.

column3: Chill in the heart of Madrid
column4: Surrounded by the culture and energy of Plaza Mayor, this is the perfect spot to rest and take in the city. Try the homemade lemonade!

column3: Fantastic Food, Excellent Service & perfect setting!x
column4: We enjoyed a superb couple of hours relaxing in the sunshine, eating the most delicious food in Madrid, served by the Cuban Guy!x Highly recommend you stop here when in Madrid!x

column3: Great place to find some good eats
column4: Great place. Will definitely recommend to everyone I hear goin to Madrid. I was surprised by their selection!
Service was amazing and food was worth the price. Everything sounded delicious, so it was hard to choose. But my boyfriend and I were more than satisfied with our choices!
Great vibes good food! Thank you yamil for the great service! The space is really nice and latee back!
A-M-A-Z-I-N-G tapas, and the pork ribs (cooked 30 hours) were tremendous ! Just add an epic service and Jazz anthems in a cosy environnement, there you go ! Just meet the Cuban Guy !!!
It's definitely one of my favorite restaurants in Madrid. The service is excellent and the food is unbelievable. I would 100% reccomend to anyone looking for a quality meal.

column3: Great food and also amazing service!
column4: We had a great diner here! The food is great such as the service! We recommend this restaurant to everyone! You will enjoy everything here!

My friend and I stopped here during our stroll around Madrid. Great decision on our part, as the service was great and the food was both delicious and fairly priced! Good people watching in Plaza Mayor, as well! Highly recommended!

The place was amazing, very well placed in the city. The restaurant is right in the heart of the city, and where the waiter was very nice and friendly. If I'll find myself in Madrid again, I will come here again for sure.
We were visiting Madrid and after some time we took a break in this place and it was amazing. Very nice location, very nice serving.

column3: Very nice place in the center.
column4: Very nice place! Love it so much! â¤ï¸â¤ï¸ Very friendly stuff. Very good coffee. In the heart of Madrid city centre.

column3: Good dinner in the heart of plaza mayor
column4: Good dinner in the heart of The plaza Mayor... Thanks to Waiter RAMOS for everything. Good experience ............
Fantastic restaurant for either great food or a couple of drinks in the picturesque Plaza Mayor Square! Will definitely return the next time I'm in Madrid!

column3: Very Cool Atmosphere and Great Service
column4: We came here because we were staying in Plaza Mayor and the food was great, especially the brisket sandwich! The basement had a very cool atmosphere with amazing friendly service from our Cuban waiter!
Played me a bday song! Definitely worth a visit! Right on Plaza Mayor so very convenient! Great atmosphere
Amazing restaurant!! Such good service it was my friends birthday and they pulled out a guitar and the whole shabang. Love it!
amazing restaurant with such good servers! we came for a birthday and they brought out a guitar and sang! definitely recommend coming here if you have the time!
Amazing food and great service. Celebrated my sisterâ€™s birthday with an amazing guitar performance by Ramos Perez. Great great experience

column3: Fantastico! Excellent food and service â¤ï¸
column4: Fantastico! Excellent food and athmosphere. Mini burgers, croquettes, vegetables tempura excellent and tasty. Special regard to the waiter singing and playing songs with his guitar for the birthday parties.
Great food and wine. The host was especially helpful and friendly. Would recommend the chicken. Highly recommended.
We had lunch to DCorazon with friends. We foubd Exellent food, very good service. We were served by Ramos, very skilled waiter.
We went on February, to discover Madrid and it was a Great choice, cheap price, nice place, good view ! Go for it, good moment
Good choices of food, with all round a good atmosphere and service. Dessert was also amazing, and great location.
Great food and wonderful, friendly staff. The chicken and salmon burrito was delicious as was the sangria!
Great place for a beer in the plaza mayor Square, Great staff especially the Cuban guy, I come back another time ğŸ˜€
Decent food, decent beer and very helpful staff give it a go if you're in this neck of the woods or close by.

column3: It the madness of Plaza Mayor..civilized and delicious!
column4: Memorable lunch in this restaurant facing Plaza Mayor. Cozy lower level dining room. Attentive friendly service, menu that satisfied and a wonderful Madrid experience! Thank you.
Was a really good place, well located, beautiful view, the Bart man was kind and smiling person, thanks Iâ€™ll come back
Just been here for a drink as we were walking around the plaza and we had a lovely experience due to an amazing Cuban waiter, he didn't say what his name was but thank you!
Had many reasonably priced drinks with friends is the sunny Plaza Mayor. Our Cuban waiter was the best!

Amazing place, great service and great prices. Waiter especially the Cuban waiter was amazing. Would highly recommend especially during the hot weather as you are directly in the sun but they also have some shade for those who canâ€™t sit in the heat.
The service 5 stars, Yamil gives great attention one of the best waitresses, the food was amazing ..
Itâ€™s a nice place, where you can go if you wanna have a drink while enjoying a sunny weather. People there are nice and they can speak English, which is great.
All the staff was friendly and sweet (and very handsome) The food was great too! Definitely recommend ğŸ˜Š
The servers are very friendly and helpful! I recommend the tuna tartare and raviolis they taste awesome

column3: The Cuban guy is the best.
column4: The Cuban guy is the best. What a fella. Chicken burrito was very good. Best restaurant in Madrid xxx
Excellent!!! Very nice food.. Perfect service! Great variety of tapas, choose the one with local cheese and of course tasty Jamon!!

column3: Probably the best choice in Plaza Mayor
column4: Delicious tapas, fantastic dessert (lemon pie), excellent service. It's a bit overpriced, but you are expected to pay a bit more anywhere at the Plaza Mayor.
Food was divine. Cuban weigher was great! Very friendly! Will be back soon! Pulled pork and chicken burrito was great
Seems like a tourist trap on the outside. I can assure you it is not. Top class food. Beautiful location. Excellent service

Great food, amazing location, good ambiance and very friendly service. You get to choose between the quieter ambiance inside or a great and busy terrace in Plaza Mayor. The Cuban server is very friendly and funny!!
Best outdoor eating in plaza mayor, catching the last afternoon sun! Great service and attention. CaÃ±as & croquetas & olives (!!!) amazing!
Superb food and service Yamil was attentive and courteous. Cannot recommend highly enough. Food delicious and prices very competetive.

Amazing restaurant! It was a Friday at 3pm and they had perfect seating outside and a great staff. Their waiters, including â€œel cubanoâ€ helped translate and offered advice on sites to see. I recommend the ceviche and cod ravioli.

Great food, as a Vegetarian can recommend the Vege Burrito and Tempura! Amazing home cooke fries too. Service was wonderful, looked after by the Cuban, lovely guy! Great value for the location , highly recommend.
Great Sangria, idyllic setting! Lovely Sangria in the sun in the Plaza Major. Reasonably priced with friendly staff.
had some lovely snacks and excellent sangria in this most beautiful and historic square in madrid. give it a go!
Cuban guy it's the best! Food it's excelent. I eat tennessee pulled pork and was the best. Also the draft beer was very good

Tuna with sesame oil kind of impress for me. It's Japanese styles and rare see in euro country ğŸ¥‘ maybe I'm just missing Eastern food when stay too long time in euro,? èŠéº»æ²¹èª¿å‘³åŠ é®ªé­šçœŸçš„æ˜¯å¥½ä¹…æ²’åœ¨æ­æ´²åƒéã€‚è®“æˆ‘æœ‰å®¶é„‰çš„æ‡·å¿µã€‚è€é—†å¾ˆæœƒä½œç”Ÿæ„ï¼Œä¸€ç›´ä¾†å¯’æš„ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¨±æ˜¯æ™‚é–“å¤ªæ—©é¡§å®¢å¤ªå¤šæ²’äº‹åšã€‚
Good service, very friendly staff. I took a nice salmon with avocado. Good postre , I suggest the tarta de la abuelita.
Came here and had a wonderful time!!!! Coffee is great, food is great, service is great and very friendly, the Cuban guy is the funniest ever

Went here for dinner with my boyfriend and had a delicious dinner. The salmon and avocado tartare was amazing. Also had a pulled pork with potatoes and a ribeye. We had seating in the basement which was pretty cool.
Top Service. Especially the Cuban waiter did an excellent job! Would definitely come back for a mid day lunch in the sun
The potatoes with slow cooked egg are a must! Excellent tuna tartare and cheaply priced wine. The staff is top notch! Totally recommend this stop in Madrid.
Food was really good and enjoyed the staff service. Very friendly!! !! !! The cuban guy is the best ;)
Had a great experience, great food and great drinks. The service was also Fantastic! Would definitely really!
Amazing restaurant, great service and wonderful food. The Cuban server from Miami was a riot and was great to talk to. Will come back many times while staying here. P.s get the bocadillo de calamari
Best place to get bocadillos de calamar in Spain. Great service from the Cuban guy. Fair price and good drinks
Nice place to have dinner on the plaza mayor, good food and fast service. And very handsome waiter...
Excellent food tasty and visually amazing Service excellent mainly due to the nice Cuban wieterst who was best in answering questions and serving the food...

Excellent experience fire alc good vibes fersher. Was totally vibin when I first got here and then the waiter handed me hella alc and we absolutely went off. Donâ€™t even remember eating the food but Iâ€™m sure it was gas ğŸ”¥

column3: The Best Place for You and Your Queens to Pop Off Extravagantly
column4: Holy ish we popped off here and the food was elite. Food was great, service was second to none. Needless to say, me and my queens will be returning to absolutely slay.

I took my son, Max Markel, here for dinner. Great experience even better people. Had the best time with my son, Max Markel, just laughing and enjoying dinner. Best father son bonding at the best restaurant in Madrid, Spain.
Went to dinner with my family while I was staying in Madrid. The server was very friendly and the food was the best I had in Madrid!
Great service, great food and drink. Highly recommend for people who want a social environment. One of my favorite places in Madrid
We went with some friends. Nice steaks and flavor. The underground zone is amazing! And the waiters are charismatic.
Excellent food with great service! Had the croquettes(amazing) and a good burger brisket Yamil the Cuban waiter was very helpful and fun to talk to!!!
A wonderful atmospheric restaurant beneath Plaza Mayor. Friendly staff and spare ribs to die for. Tender and unctuous!

Fantastic food, service and atmosphere. Perfect lunch! Food was delicious. We sat in the basement which was quaint. Our server was very attentive and prices were reasonable. Plus - conveniently located in Plaza Mayor

column3: Snow in Madrid, but great food at Dcorazon!
column4: We did a tour of the Royal Palace and went to Dcorazan after a frigid walk to get there. It did not disappoint. We had risotto, Salomon tartare, burrata, and some other tasty dishes. They were all excellent and the atmosphere was awesome!
Superb kitchen! Very delicious spanish cousine. Good location, authentic interior, vine is very tasty!
Very good tapas and Spanish food. The Cuban host is great. The location and atmosphere are excellent.
Very Nice place to eat! Nice tapas and had very tasteful dinner!! Great service!!! And the cuban host is the best!

column3: Best meal we had in all of Spain
column4: Best meal we had in all of Spain! Staff is amazing, wine is great, and food is seasoned perfectly. Highly recommend
I like the food and it was very beautiful place â¤ï¸ Very clean and the staff it was very good and I will come back again
Great Restaurant ;) perfect localisation;) and fantastic waitress yamil cubano. I will come back here
Great ambiance and great service, eating in a cave is worth it by itself! And the Cuban Guy is great and took great care of us!
Excellent service, friendly staff and great food. The ambiance alone is worth a visit. The Cuban Guy is great! Ask for him.
Good food. Friendly staff. Yamil was helpful and also very funny :) Ordered a main course and a glass of wine. Service was fast.
Best place ever, cheap, nice service good drinks and very friendly atmosphere. Also very good location
Cold beer and friendly service. We did not have time for food but the menu is interesting and good for anyone

column3: Some of the best calamari in the world
column4: Some of the best calamari in the world. The service was professional, fast and warm. Ask for Jose he is the cutest!
Had dinner with my husband and enjoyed a delicious tuna tartare and marinated salmon. The service from â€œel cubanoâ€ was excellent, really made us feel right at home.
A lovely place with friendly staff. 3 bottles of caramulo & beautiful food. Croquettes were tits. Salud!
Great food and atmosphere. The exposed brick is a nice ambience and the service is lively and attentive.

column3: Very nice wine and cool atmosphere
column4: Very nice wine and cool atmosphere underground, below a bustling area. Nice entrecote and fries. Great service and would definitely come again :)
Totally worth the visit. Fun staff and really great tasting food. Jamil is such a great server. The ceviche is a hit.
The Cuba guy is the best. This place is place under the sun. Til the last moment of it. Drink Cava and enjoy. Service is excellent, you feel only the good energy. Here and in La Latina region.
Nice food and place. Attention is quick and gratefull. Very good ubic right in Plaza mayor. Totally recommended
The food at this restaurant was not only unique but delicious! The Huevos Rotos Dcorazon was incredible! The waiter also helped me pick a delicious white wine. Overall, this was a great experience!
First day in Madrid and had drinks and food here-great spot!! Super friendly service too, especially the Cuban guy!! Will definitely be back here.
Wonderful food and service. Had langostino and tapas and sangria! So welcoming, Cuban waiter is the best!!
Food was great, good atmosphere and very nice waiter. Would recommend the huevos rotos, they were quite good.
Great food and service in a nice ambient. There is an option to stay outside or inside. The guy Yamil attended us and he was really nice, made great suggestions.
Great food, fantastic service. Jamille was excellent and really helpful - worth a visit if youâ€™re around plaza Mayor!
Excellent tapas and alcohol. Love the decor and how itâ€™s underground! The waiter was amazing as well! I can see why itâ€™s so regarded!

This place was amazing. The service, the ambience, and the food were wonderful. The whole experience is perfect for anyone who enjoys food, friendship, and conversation. They really make the whole meal an enjoyable experience.
Was here with my boyfriend for a lunch. Server found us a table withouth reservation in a full restaurant. Food was delicious and the wine was great. Service*
Our waiter was friendly and humorous. Great time and great toilets. Also the wine was pretty good too!
The mushroom risotto did not disappoint! It was rich, fantastic, and tastes of truffle. The Cuban guy is the best! :)

column3: Food Great - Server not so good
column4: The food was good, we got a tortilla, cod ravioli and a pesto dish..the server was the only part we didn't like - the rest of the staff was super nice.

Beautiful place with a nice adega that remember the medieval era. The meal that I ask for was good but not the best one I had, and think that is expensive for what It offers. Despite that, in general, the visit was good.

All food is just incredible. Take at any cost the Brownie. It's in the basement and a bit romantic. It's also ideal for Groups. What else to say? Cubano is the best and las gatitas odjan los mosquitos.
The food was great and Yamil our server made our experience in the restaurant great. The Croqueta were delicious, we also had the brisket burger and the steak and fries.
SOOOO good! I got the eggs and potatoes dish on the first page. Eggs acted as sauce for the baked AND fried potatoes. Waiter was a hella cool guy!
Nice food and Nice location. It is a special place and Nice service. The Cuban mister who serves the food is Nice. Wonderful ambiance.
Good food and service. Excellent price and we had a blast. We had several tapas and appetizer, and veal, cod, pulled pork and ribs for mains, and everyone enjoyed their food.

column3: Friendly staff, next to a X'mas market, good food, reasonable price
column4: æ°£æ°›å¾ˆå¥½ï¼Œè£ä¿®åƒåœ¨åœ°çª–ä¸­ç”¨é¤ï¼Œå¾ˆæœ‰è¶£ã€‚ é£Ÿç‰©å¾ˆå¥½ï¼Œå°¤å…¶æµå¿ƒè›‹è–¯ç‰‡æ¾éœ²ï¼Œååˆ†é›£å¿˜ï¼è·å“¡åœ¨ä¸Šèœå¾Œæœƒå¾ˆç”¨å¿ƒåœ°æŠŠæµå¿ƒè›‹æ‹Œå‹»ã€‚ å¦å¤–é»äº†æ„å¤§åˆ©é£¯å’Œç‡‰ç…®è±¬è‚‰ï¼Œåªæ˜¯æˆ‘å€‹äººèªç‚ºç•¥ç‚ºé¹¹äº†ä¸€é»ï¼Œé™¤æ­¤ä¹‹å¤–ï¼Œå‘³é“éƒ½å¾ˆå¥½ï¼Œå“¡å·¥å¾ˆç´°å¿ƒå‹å–„ï¼Œæœƒä¸»å‹•æä¾›å”åŠ©ã€‚
Delicious food. We ordered seafood, rolls, steaks and calamaris. We had very nice time there. Strongly recommended!
Pork rib that cooked for 30 hours is highly recommended! And also the Tennessee pulled pork is also great!
Yamil was the best! Guided us through the menu like the prince of verduras. All the food was amazing, but most of all yamil made sure we loved everything, every step of the way.
Canâ€™t say enough good things about this place. Everything was fantastic, including our waiter Yamil! He is the best!
Nice atmosphere with delicious food! Service with a smile by Yamil the cuban guy! Highly recommend when visiting Madrid :)
Excelent restaurant in Plaza Mayor, it was so good we came two days in a row! Loved the tortilla sampler, pan rocoso and the veal entrecÃ´te!! Excellent service and gorgeous underground seating!
Such a nice place to eat right in the heart of Madrid. We had wonderful service and great tasting food! Highly recommend!
Restaurant has a good atmosphere. We had a good evening with my wife and son. The food was delicious and the service was good - Yamil the Cuban was very good and funny. Overall Good value for money
Brilliant place..great food and staff amazing..especially the Cuban guy ! We will be back ğŸ˜ƒ fish course is especially good..coffee too
Wow! By far the best place in Madrid from two people who live in Portland, Maine. Fresh fresh healthy food and pulled pork!!
Great atmosphere and food to follow. Service was great and everyone is attentive and nice! Recommend
Great food , great staff!!!Highly Recommended !!Cubano guy is good!!The wine is perfect and the Tennessee pullpork is excellent!!!
The food was just amazing here. Staff were so nice and helpful! The menu had so many different thing I wanted to try thatâ€™ll Iâ€™ll probably come back the next day after writing this review!
The food was great and it is located in a beautiful part of the city. The people are very hospitable and easy to talk to.
Had a great time in this place. The staff is great and of course, also the food. Iâ€™ll definitely come back.
Enjoyed the food and the ambience. Very good beer and burrito. Good service as well. Enjoyed the time with my friends.
Excellent service and exquisite Spanish Cuisine. The Creps de Carrillera was amazing. We had trhe tapas and it was good too. Overall it was a great experience and I would recommend it.

I stopped by this restaurant to eat after walking around the area and just loved it. Waiter Yamil took care of me and had exceptional service and made me feel very welcome. I would absolutely come back.
The risotto was really good!!. Closed to the city center. The staff was great. The suggestion of the chef was good.
Fun place with great food and great service. Tapas, beer, and wine were all excellent! We had a great time and felt very welcome at DCorazÃ³n
The Cuban waiter was the best ! Good variety of food and great desserts. Location is prime, right in the main plaza.
Very good! The tapas we ordered were fantastic! Recommend the croquettes and the ceviche. The service was also exceptional.
Had some lovely starters and mains here on our first day. Big portions, tasty and reasonably priced!
We had a great evening with the whole Family. 14 People had great food with a fair price and would come back if we ever return to Madrid.
Great restaurant and location! We loved the food. We will definitely be back next time we come to Madrid!
Seafood , meat and everything are delicious! I â€˜m glad to seeing this restaurant. I will come back here!
Our waiter jamil was amazing and friendly! The food was great and the atmosphere here is warm and inviting!
Lovely restaurant - deep under the plaza in brick lined vaults. Service was wonderful, very friendly, helpful, quick. Food was excellent, very delicious.
Good quality food and perfect drinks. I really enjoyed the white sangria and my wife the homemade lemonade. But what impressed me more was the tortilla espanola with truffles.
Delicious food- excellent service!!! Would 100% recommend. The waiter Yamil was very friendly and played guitar very well!
